data.text: @USAmbPH Enough of the damn vaccine posts and updates, we need your sorry A$$ to redirect your attention on other ISSUES like visa backlogs and K1. Is this a joke to you, do you know how to read words on Twitter!?

@USAmbPH Where are the visa backlog updates Heather? I can keep this up. Resign from your position because you don't do S** but waste your day on Twitter and photo ops. You are an embarrassment & disappointment & that goes for everyone holding up visas. WE WANT FKNG VISA UPDATES! 🖕🖕🖕
